title: 'Genius' mum teaches daughter how to sneak alcohol into any venue using an umbrella
text:
'Genius' mum teaches daughter how to sneak alcohol into any venue using an umbrella Time to invest in one these contraptions Share Never be far away from your next drink ever again (Photo: Getty) Share Get   
There's nothing like a glass of booze to enhance, well, anything. 
It can take the edge of stressful situations, render boring ones tolerable and generally makes you more of an interesting person. 
19 year-old Hayleigh Quinn's mum knows this. 
While many of us cease as adults to come up with inventive ways of sneaking in booze wherever we go, Hayleigh's mum will probably make you want to start doing it again. 
Hayleigh was on a train with her mum when she produced her polka dot umbrella. 
Much to Hayleigh's surprise and delight, her mum had cunningly concealed a hip flask as her brolly. 
It's a trick the whole world needs to know, and Hayleigh passed it on in a tweet captioned: 
"FKN HOWLING oot wi ma maw n she's brought her umbrella which is actually a hip flask in disguise (sic)." 
Hayleigh later confirmed had found the umbrella flask on Amazon - it's availbale to buy and will set you back Â£15.99. 
Apparently the makers say they regularly change the print of the 'umbrellas', so the 'fun police' don't catch on. 
We think Hayleigh's mum in a genius. Train prices are astronomical. Like us on Facebook
